item.title: China Traders Are Leveraging Up The Most on Record on Flush Cash
item.description: Chinese traders are borrowing more money to invest in the stock market, reaching a record high in June. The surge in leverage is a sign that traders are confident in the market and are willing to take on more risk. However, the high level of leverage could be a risk to the market if the economy were to slow down.
